metadata.title: BrickNote - The iOS Construction Site Management App
metadata.description: Manage your construction sites with ease. Voice notes, annotated photos, AI-generated reports and offline mode. Coming soon to the App Store.
metadata.keywords: construction, site management, OPC, management, building, meeting, AI assistant, offline, iOS, iPhone
metadata.ogTitle: BrickNote - The iOS Construction Site Management App
metadata.ogDescription: Manage your construction sites with ease. Voice notes, annotated photos, AI-generated reports and offline mode.
metadata.twitterTitle: BrickNote - Construction Site Management on iOS
metadata.twitterDescription: Voice notes, annotated photos, AI assistant. Coming soon to the App Store.

hero.description: Centralize notes, photos and meeting reports. Annotate your images and ask questions to the AI assistant.

features.subtitle: Tools designed for the field, accessible in a few taps.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Ask questions about your project. The assistant knows all your notes and can summarize them instantly.

meetingRecording.title: Meeting recording
meetingRecording.description: Record your site meetings. Automatic AI transcription and summary.

annotatedPhotos.title: Annotated photos
annotatedPhotos.description: Take photos and annotate them directly. Circles, arrows, text - anything is possible.

multiProject.title: Multi-project
multiProject.description: Manage multiple sites in parallel. Switch from one project to another in a tap.

chronologicalJournal.title: Chronological journal
chronologicalJournal.description: Easily find your notes by date. Complete history of each site.

offlineMode.title: Offline mode
offlineMode.description: Works without connection. Your data syncs as soon as the network returns.

benefits.subtitle: BrickNote is designed for construction professionals who need a simple, fast and reliable tool.

localData.title: Local data
localData.description: Your information stays on your device. Privacy guaranteed.

voiceMode.title: Voice mode
voiceMode.description: Dictate your notes and questions. The app responds aloud.

nativeIOS.title: Native iOS app
nativeIOS.description: A real iPhone app, smooth and optimized for the field.

testimonials.subtitle: Discover what our users say about BrickNote.

marie.quote: BrickNote has revolutionized how we document meetings. No more handwritten notes, everything is recorded and summarized automatically.
marie.author: Marie Dubois

thomas.quote: Photo annotation directly on site saves us a huge amount of time. No more email exchanges to explain where the problem is.
thomas.author: Thomas Martin

sophie.quote: Offline mode is essential on our sites where network coverage is often poor. Everything works perfectly without connection.
sophie.author: Sophie Bernard

cta.description: Start using BrickNote now. Your data stays on your device, no account required.
cta.trustNote: Coming soon to App Store · Works offline · 100% local data

footer.description: The iOS construction site management app. Notes, annotated photos, meetings and AI assistant.

contact.metaDescription: Contact the BrickNote team. We respond to all your questions within 24 hours.
contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: A question, suggestion or need help? Our team responds within 24 hours.

support.title: Support
support.value: Our team is available Monday to Friday, 9am-6pm.

free.question: Is BrickNote really free?
free.answer: Yes, the app is completely free and works without sign-up.

dataSecure.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecure.answer: Your data stays on your device. No information is sent to our servers without your consent.

offlineWork.question: Does the app work offline?
offlineWork.answer: Yes, all main features are available without internet connection.

useCases.metaDescription: Discover how BrickNote adapts to each construction profession: OPC, Site Supervisor, Site Manager.
useCases.title: BrickNote for every profession
useCases.subtitle: Discover how the app adapts to your role and transforms your daily work on site.

opc.title: OPC
opc.description: Scheduling, Management, Coordination. Manage the planning and coordination of all trades.
painPoints: Coordinating interventions from dozens of companies
Producing detailed reports after each meeting
Tracking actions and follow-ups in real time
features: Audio recording of meetings with AI transcription
Action tracking by company and by lot

conducteur.title: Site Supervisor
conducteur.description: Supervise site progress and ensure liaison between the office and the field.
painPoints: Communicate effectively with the design office
features: Complete history by zone or lot
PDF export for sharing with stakeholders

chef.title: Site Manager
chef.description: Coordinate teams on site and ensure compliance with deadlines and quality.
features: Offline mode for areas without network

workflow.action: Review planning and prepare for site meeting
AI generates the report during the break
Review and send report to companies

benefits: Save 2 hours per meeting on report writing
Zero information loss thanks to recording
Complete traceability of decisions and commitments

quote.text: Before BrickNote, I spent my evenings writing reports. Now it's done in 10 minutes.
quote.author: Marie D.

workflow.action: Morning site tour with photos of critical areas
Annotation of defects found on plans
Sync with the office from site base
Prepare weekly report assisted by AI

quote.text: Photo annotation has changed the way I work. No more lengthy explanatory emails.
quote.author: Thomas L.

workflow.action: Check today's tasks on the app
Team briefing with shared annotated photos
Voice note to report a material need
Technical question to the AI assistant
Progress photo for the site supervisor

benefits: Intuitive interface usable in the field

quote.text: Finally an app that understands field constraints. I even use it with my gloves.
quote.author: Karim B.
